name: Schmichael, Barkblangel, and the Lost City of Bingus
name_original: Schmichael, Barkblangel, and the Lost City of Bingus
description:
A reality-warping platformer about searching for your dog

I worked on this game over the course of 48 hours with my friends Andrew Burgess and Max Ayre for Global Game Jam 2021. Hope you enjoy it! :)
